title: "BT to cut up to 55,000 jobs by 2030 as fibre and AI arrive"
excerpt: "BT Group , Britain's biggest broadband and mobile provider, will cut up to 55,000 jobs including contractors by 2030 - potentially over 40% of its workforce as it completes its fibre roll-out and adapts to new technologies such as AI."
